readable.title: 3204686006_88f04547b9
readable.content: A few sledders are chased by a dog . A group of people go sledding on a snowy hill and a dog chases one as he slides . Children sled and a dog plays on a snowy hill . Four people and a dog play in the snow . Four people in various stage of sledding on a snowy hill , while a dog playfully chases one of them .
